summary: The diff shows modifications to frontend files (ProductForm.tsx, useProducts.ts, frontend-file-summaries.txt, and project_state.json) that add detailed error logging to the frontend as required by REQ-96. However, there is no evidence of any backend changes to main.mo that would address REQ-94 (removing/bypassing permission checks) or REQ-95 (adding backend error logging). The diff appears to be truncated and may not include all changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the backend addProduct method in main.mo to remove or bypass the permission check that is incorrectly rejecting authenticated admin users
missing_requirements.reason: No modifications to main.mo are present in the diff. The backend file containing the addProduct method was not changed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add detailed error logging to the backend addProduct method that captures and logs the exact authentication state, caller principal, and permission validation results
missing_requirements.reason: No modifications to main.mo are present in the diff. Backend logging for authentication state, caller principal, and permission validation was not added.
